algorithmRuleCode.label: Rule for Incomplete Courses
algorithmRuleCode.description: The student achievement record session date is earlier than a month ago and the achievement was not written or given a special case

algorithmRuleCode.label: Rule for Incomplete Assessments
algorithmRuleCode.description: The student achievement record session date is earlier than a month ago and the achievement was not written or given a special case

algorithmRuleCode.label: Registrations
algorithmRuleCode.description: The student achievement record session date is from a month ago or later and the achievement was not written or given a special case

algorithmRuleCode.label: Assessment Registrations
algorithmRuleCode.description: The student achievement record session date is from a month ago or later and the achievement was not written or given a special case

algorithmRuleCode.label: Failed
algorithmRuleCode.description: Based on letter grade table or special case table showing which letter grades or special case are deemed a pass vs fail

algorithmRuleCode.label: Failed Assessments
algorithmRuleCode.description: Based on letter grade table or special case table showing which letter grades or special case are deemed a pass vs fail

algorithmRuleCode.label: Duplicate
algorithmRuleCode.description: If duplicate course code and course level the course with the highest number of credits, highest final %, earliest session date is used

algorithmRuleCode.label: Duplicate Assessments
algorithmRuleCode.description: If duplicate assessment code and the assessment with the highest proficiency score, highest special case,earliest ssion date is used

algorithmRuleCode.label: CPCourses
algorithmRuleCode.description: Career Preparation (“CP”) courses are not eligible for 2018 program even though they are reported on the transcript

algorithmRuleCode.label: LDCourses
algorithmRuleCode.description: Locally Developed (LD – “X”) courses are not eligible for 2018 program even though they are reported on the transcript

algorithmRuleCode.label: RestrictedCourses
algorithmRuleCode.description: If course is restricted against another course the course with the highest number of credits, highest final %, earliest session date is used

algorithmRuleCode.label: MinCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student requires a minimum of 16 grade 12 level credits

algorithmRuleCode.label: MatchCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must meet a minimum of 4-credits from each of the specified non-elective subject areas

algorithmRuleCode.label: AssessmentsMatchCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must meet a minimum of 4-credits from each of the specified non-elective subject areas

algorithmRuleCode.label: MinElectiveCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must meet a minimum of 28 elective credits

algorithmRuleCode.label: FrenchImmersionMatchCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must meet a minimum of 4-credits from each of the specified French immersion non-elective subject areas

algorithmRuleCode.label: FrenchImmersionMinElectiveCredit
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must meet a minimum of 12 elective credits from courses taught in French – 4 credits at the grade 11 or 12 level

algorithmRuleCode.label: CareerProgramMatchCredits
algorithmRuleCode.description: Student must have a course that meets a minimum of 3 credits that is considered a work experience course
